participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Rebellious and introspective, Lucas often feels misunderstood and struggles with authority.
participant_1.background: i ride the bus to school. my brother is older than me. i'm 13 years old. i hate math class. i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Dr. Sarah Thompson
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, Dr. Sarah is passionate about her work and loves spending time with her daughter.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy.
